unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my father passed away. A friend suggested a mental health app, saying it helped her cope after her grandmother's death in Kerala. Initially, I was skeptical. But the guided meditations reminded me of my Ajji's calming stories. It wasn't "3 Idiots" magically solving problems, but it did offer a small solace, a safe space like the NIMHANS counselling center. Maybe it can help you too.
